function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Spread of contagious diseases due to lack of need-based initiatives and geopolitical cooperation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Impact of pandemic on informal sector workers and migrant workers","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased incidence of suicide among vulnerable populations","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Contagious disease spread due to lockdown-related limitations on economic activities and livelihoods","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Health inequalities due to existing social stratification and resource sharing","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in domestic violence cases and mental health issues due to social isolation and lockdowns","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Emerging issues related to jobs and income of millions of people, social safety net, future of income support schemes, the burden on women, and the plight of migrants and informal sector workers","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of access to resources and sudden disappearance of informal sectors of employment","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Developmental impacts on health, education, gender, economy, politics, and the environment","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate management of health risks, injuries, diseases, disabilities, psychological problems, and deaths in pandemics","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of pandemics on human life and the global economy","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate and inaccurate covid-19 information in literature","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of grey literature in the study","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Language limitation to english","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposure to contagious diseases through literature search and review of covid-19 related materials.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Spread of contagious diseases due to lack of access to healthcare","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poverty leading to increased vulnerability to contagious diseases","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Weak rural infrastructure exacerbating disease spread","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges related to employment and income of millions of people","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fear and anxiety due to economic shocks and recession","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of travel constraints and quarantine measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposure to the virus among field workers","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Isolation and work environment concerns for remote workers","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of training in covid-19 signs and symptoms, social distancing, and hygiene practices.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffective communication leading to lack of updates and information for furloughed employees.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reduced productivity and workforce shortages due to challenges faced during remote work, isolation, and lack of equipment.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Preference for living in gated communities during pandemics may lead to increased concentration of individuals in a confined space, raising the risk of disease spread.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Encouragement of others to move to gated communities may lead to societal segregation and inequitable access to resources and amenities during pandemics.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on the gated community environment for safety during pandemics may lead to complacency in implementing broader public health measures.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor ventilation in built environments","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of sanitation and hygiene practices","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Testing the antiviral efficacy of surfacewise 2 in liquid form using astm e1052 standard test method.","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Using unvalidated research data to guide clinical practice.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of sars-cov-2 in crowded or confined spaces","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global shortages of personal protective equipment ppe","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unemployment due to workplace closures","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Covid-19 transmission in workplace settings","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ppe usage and availability","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of education and awareness on ipc measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Assessment of workplace measures for preventing and controlling sars-cov-2 transmission","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exclusion of mental health outcomes","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exclusion of sars-cov and mers-cov studies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of inexperienced researchers for screening","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Discrepancies in extracted data","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of bias in quality assessment","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low quality of evidence in cross-sectional studies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Incomplete or biased data in modelling studies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Discrepancies in quality assessment resolved mutually between reviewers","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of random-effects meta-analysis method without considering common effect size","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential risk of uncontrolled spread of contagious diseases due to community transmission rate during intervention period","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"}]}
